actions.name: Covering Fire
actions.description: Using a Ranged Weapon, the user may provide Covering Fire and delay their next Activation by 20%. Set up a Covering Fire Clock with 3 Spans. The user and their allies may tick a Span on this Clock to claim Light Cover (or Heavy Cover if already in Light Cover) from incoming non-[Contact] attacks. The Covering Fire effect ends when either the clock is filled, or the user's next Activation begins.
